title: Idea: create a option to Test all Connections - test if all TCP Ports are with status Open (available to connect)
author: evandroks
body_snippet:
Idea: 

Create a option to Test all Connections - test if all TCP Ports are with status Open

It would be nice to know if all servers are available to connect.

This option would test the TCP port of each connection and show in the screen with connections are not available to connect.

Thank you
